{"id":731203419,"lang":"python3","time":"3Â months","timestamp":1656190692,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"201 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/731203419/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"15.3 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def pivotIndex(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:\n        total=sum(nums)\n        leftSum=0\n        \n        for i in range(len(nums)):\n            rightSum=total-nums[i]-leftSum\n            if leftSum==rightSum:\n                return i\n            leftSum+=nums[i]\n        return -1\n                \n            \n        ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index"}
